page.title: 03BURTON HOSPITAL CLUB
page.content: The hospital club is just off Belvoir Road,as you go up the drive you can see the cricket pitch.At the hospital club they play cricket in the league and for the shield.All the cricketers get a tea of sandwiches or salad.You can rent a room for the evening for a dance or meeting and every week there is a dance.A little while ago I went to a dance and they had a raffle,feeling in a good mood I bought ten tickets for a pound.When they had the draw I won a huge teddy bear (made by the doctors and nurses) that was only a little bit shorter than me when it was standing up straight.So now I've got it in my bedroom.There are also a few one armed bandits (that hardly ever pay out).There is a bar that stays open to 11.00pm Mondays to Saturdays and on Sundays it is open to 10.30pm.
